name: Help Haiti T-Shirt
description: Show your support for the Haitian earthquake victims. 100% of the proceeds from the sale of this shirt will go to Doctors Without Borders, an international medical humanitarian organization that has been providing medical care in Haiti for years. Their three existing medical facilities in Port-au-Prince were damaged in the earthquake, and they have already treated over 2,000 people who were injured in the quake. Shipping within the US is included free of charge. Shipping to the UK or Canada is $5. Please note that this is a pre-order. On Friday, January 22, ordering will be closed and the shirts will be printed and then shipped to you.
